author: Fextralife
description:
BEST ARPGs To Play NOW 
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be talking about the best ARPGs to play in 2025. And in this case, I'm talking about the best Isometric loot-driven hack and slash titles that you can play. Not the Action RPGs, like the First Berserker Khazan or anything like that.
